description: Displays a conversational exchange with speech bubbles for each speaker. Use for modelling role plays or showcasing tone choices.

fields.title: Optional heading shown above the bubbles.
fields.subtitle: Optional rubric or framing text.
fields.body: Optional array of paragraphs rendered above the dialogue.
fields.dialogue: Array of turns. Each turn supports speaker, side ('left' or 'right'), lines (string or array), optional note, and avatar metadata.

turnSchema.speaker: Label for who is speaking.
lines: One or more strings rendered as paragraphs inside the bubble.
turnSchema.note: Optional facilitator aside displayed in muted text inside the bubble.

avatar.src: Optional URL for an avatar image.
avatar.label: Fallback initials or label if no image is provided.

example.title: Mentor language in action
example.subtitle: Notice where the mentor validates and redirects.

dialogue.speaker: Mentor
lines: I hear how rushed the deadline feels. What would help you slow the spiral?

dialogue.speaker: Learner
lines: I'm worried I'll disappoint the team.
If I ask for help it means I'm behind.

dialogue.speaker: Mentor
lines: Let's list what support you already have and what one ask could unlock next.
